scripts.d1:push:dev: wrangler d1 execute potato-users-dev --remote --file=./drizzle/$(ls -t drizzle/*.sql | head -1 | xargs basename)
scripts.d1:push:prod: wrangler d1 execute potato-users --remote --file=./drizzle/$(ls -t drizzle/*.sql | head -1 | xargs basename)
scripts.d1:push:all:dev: for file in drizzle/*.sql; do wrangler d1 execute potato-users-dev --remote --file="$file"; done
scripts.d1:push:all:prod: for file in drizzle/*.sql; do wrangler d1 execute potato-users --remote --file="$file"; done
